flowRoot.flowPara: Syria went from 18% of all refugees to 29%.As such, starting in mid-2014,the Syrian Arab Republic replaced Afghanistan asthe main source country of refugees worldwide,a rank Afghanistan had previously held for morethan three decades

tspan.tspan: Afghanistan was replaced as the top source country for
refugees for the first time in over 30 years
